gw.bizrules

Interface IBizRulesPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBizRulesPlugin

    public interface IBizRulesPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BizRulesPageNavigationSupport getAppBizRulesPageNavigation(Rule rule)
      Returns the app specific BizRulesPagesNavigationSupport instance to help navigate through the bizrules pcf pages
      java.util.Set<IMethodReference> getBlackListedMethods()
      Provides a list of black-listed methods.
      java.util.Set<IPropertyReference> getBlackListedProperties()
      Provides a list of black-listed properties.
      java.util.Set<IRuleAction> getRuleActions()
      Provides a list of RuleActions to register in the system.
      IRulePermissionProvider getRulePermissionProvider()
      Deprecated. 
      As of 10.0.0, rule permissions should be defined in the security-config.xml as follows for an example rule subtype FooRule:
       
 <BizRulesPermissions>
   <RuleSubtypeAccessProfile entity="FooRule">
     <RuleViewPermission permission="fooruleview"/>
     <RuleEditPermission permission="fooruleedit"/>
     <RuleDeployPermission permission="fooruledeploy"/>
     <RuleImportPermission permission="fooruleimport"/>
     <RuleApprovePermission permission="fooruleapprove"/>
     </RuleSubtypeAccessProfile>
 </BizRulesPermissions>
      java.util.Map<TriggeringPointKey,IRuleContextDefinition[]> getTriggeringPointMap()
      Provides a map of TriggeringPointKey to List of IRuleContextDefinition.
      java.util.Map<IMethodReference,java.lang.String> getWhiteListedMethods()
      Provides a list of white-listed methods.
      boolean isLookupEnabled()
      Enable/Disable Lookups for BizRules - In default impl it's disabled(false)

    • Method Detail

      • getBlackListedProperties

        java.util.Set<IPropertyReference> getBlackListedProperties()
        Provides a list of black-listed properties. These properties will be excluded from the auto-completion suggestions.

      • getWhiteListedMethods

        java.util.Map<IMethodReference,java.lang.String> getWhiteListedMethods()
        Provides a list of white-listed methods. These methods will be shown in the auto-completion suggestions. Care must be taken to only expose methods that do not change the state of the system.
        For each method, please provide an optional description to be displayed in Context Help.
        This list can be used to override the default behavior.
        If a method is both white- and black-listed (e.g. through inheritance), it is visible.
        If not specified in either list, the default behavior is for methods on entities to be hidden and methods on other types are visible.

      • getBlackListedMethods

        java.util.Set<IMethodReference> getBlackListedMethods()
        Provides a list of black-listed methods. These methods should not be shown in the auto-completion suggestions.
        This list can be used to override the default behavior.
        If a method is both white- and black-listed (e.g. through inheritance), it is visible.
        If not specified in either list, the default behavior is for methods on entities to be hidden and methods on other types are visible.

      • getTriggeringPointMap

        java.util.Map<TriggeringPointKey,IRuleContextDefinition[]> getTriggeringPointMap()
        Provides a map of TriggeringPointKey to List of IRuleContextDefinition. These triggering points will be registered by the BizRulesComponentMapper

      • getRuleActions

        java.util.Set<IRuleAction> getRuleActions()
        Provides a list of RuleActions to register in the system. These actions will be registered by the BizRulesComponentMapper

      • isLookupEnabled

        boolean isLookupEnabled()
        Enable/Disable Lookups for BizRules - In default impl it's disabled(false)

      • getAppBizRulesPageNavigation

        BizRulesPageNavigationSupport getAppBizRulesPageNavigation(Rule rule)
        Returns the app specific BizRulesPagesNavigationSupport instance to help navigate through the bizrules pcf pages

      • getRulePermissionProvider

        @Deprecated
IRulePermissionProvider getRulePermissionProvider()
        Deprecated. As of 10.0.0, rule permissions should be defined in the security-config.xml as follows for an example rule subtype FooRule:
         
 <BizRulesPermissions>
   <RuleSubtypeAccessProfile entity="FooRule">
     <RuleViewPermission permission="fooruleview"/>
     <RuleEditPermission permission="fooruleedit"/>
     <RuleDeployPermission permission="fooruledeploy"/>
     <RuleImportPermission permission="fooruleimport"/>
     <RuleApprovePermission permission="fooruleapprove"/>
     </RuleSubtypeAccessProfile>
 </BizRulesPermissions>
        Provides an IRulePermissionProvider implementation to register in the system. The provider will be used to do security/permission checks in UI and business logic.
